dcterms:description: A dataset containing 658 samples, including normal connections and two types of nonconforming threaded pipe connections, used in a real-world case study.
dcterms:title: Threaded Pipe Connection Dataset

dcterms:creator: N.V. Chawla
K.W. Bowyer
L.O. Hall
W.P. Kegelmeyer
dcterms:description: A technique for generating synthetic samples for minority classes to address class imbalance in datasets.
dcterms:title: SMOTE (Synthetic Minority Over-sampling Technique)

dcterms:creator: A. Elías
R. Jiménez
A.M. Paganoni
L.M. Sangalli
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides integrated depths for partially observed functional data, useful for analyzing incomplete functional datasets.
dcterms:title: POIFD (Partially Observed Integrated Functional Data)

dcterms:creator: J. Park
J. Ahn
Y. Jeon
dcterms:description: A dataset used for sparse functional linear discriminant analysis, focusing on classification tasks involving functional data.
dcterms:title: SFLDA (Sparse Functional Linear Discriminant Analysis)

dcterms:description: Functional data collected from manufacturing processes, referenced in the context of the proposed framework for imbalanced classification.
dcterms:title: Functional Data from Manufacturing Processes
